name: Teleportation Hopping
description:
This game is specifically for the Pixel Bored Game Jam of January 20th 2020. This game jam was made during the time of working 35 hours and being the time right before my first semester of my senior year of college and having no formal class for game development.

Game:
This game was based on the concept of only being able to have one mechanic. The player can click on the pink/blue boxes to be able to teleport. The only way to progress is to figure out where the goal is.
